product: RN AM4 64W B10 DVT PDL Power Data Processing, ------ this is only descriptive notes
calculate: CREATE TABLE append2 AS SELECT Total_APU_P, Total_APU_P-APU_VDD_Total_P-APU_SOC_Total_P-VDDIO_SUS_APU_P-VDD_18_P as ROC_P FROM CSV2
CREATE TABLE group2 AS select avg(Total_APU_P) as AVG_Total_APU_P, avg(ROC_P) as AVG_ROC_P from append2 group by CAST(rowid/100 AS INTEGER)
result: select max(AVG_ROC_P), min(AVG_ROC_P), max(AVG_Total_APU_P), min(AVG_Total_APU_P) from group2

header.name: this line addresses the column names
header.skip: how many rows were skipped after name row

comments.calculate: sql statements used for processing CSV files
